Benchmark.title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the R1100 requirement
Benchmark.description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the R1100 requirement.

metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

Profile.title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the R1100 requirement
Profile.description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the R1100 requirement.

Rule.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value
Rule.description: Make sure that the value specified, for the check_existence property, is properly supported for the unix-def:file_test.
